properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: As I went out one may morning, One may morning betime, I met a maid, from home had strayed, Just as the sun did shine.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: "What makes you rise so soon, my dear, Your journey to pursue? Your pretty little feet, they tread so neat. Strike off the morning dew."

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: "I'm going to feed my father's flock, His young and tender lambs, That over hills and over dales Lie waiting for their dams."

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: "Oh stay, oh stay, you handsome maid, And rest a moment here, For there is none but you alone That I do love so dear."

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: "How gloriously the sun doth shine, How pleasant 'tis the air. I'd rather rest on a true love's breast Than any other where."

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: "For I am thine and thou art mine. No man shall uncomfort thee. We'll join our hands in wedded bands And a-married we will be."
